thread.title: Woman critically injured after hit-and-run in Everett
thread.title_full: Woman critically injured after hit-and-run in Everett | www.kirotv.com

author: kirotv.com
title: Woman critically injured after hit-and-run in Everett
text:
A woman, believed to be in her 50s, was critically injured Saturday night when she was hit by a car.
The hit-and-run occurred in Everett at around 10:30 p.m., at the intersection of 4th Ave W and 128th St SW.
The woman was taken to Harborview, after suffering serious injuries.
Witnesses told police the car that struck the woman and fled was a dark-colored passenger car. It will have front end damage and possibly a broken windshield, according to police.
Anyone with information is asked to call 911.
